title: Life in the balance
brief_description: Demonstrates the principals and practices of cardiopulmonary resuscitation within the coronary care unit. Shows how a coronary care unit can provide for the prevention, detection and treatment of serious arrhythmias, cardiogenic shock and cardiac arrest.
